thread.title: Egyptian anti-corruption lawyer released on bail in bribery case
thread.title_full: Egyptian anti-corruption lawyer released on bail in bribery case - Politics - Egypt - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Egyptian anti-corruption lawyer released on bail in bribery case
text:
Related Egyptian anti-corruption activist arrested, investigated for bribery charges Independent lawyer and former MP Hamdi El-Fakharany, well-known for his anti-corruption activism, was released on bail on Saturday having been arrested in September on charges of bribery.
El-Fakharany was alleged to have demanded LE3.5 million from a businessman in return for dropping a corruption lawsuit against him.
The prosecution imposed a gagging order on the case.
The former MP's renown is a result of high-profile corruption-related lawsuits against companies and businessmen in the past decade including Talaat Mostafa Group, Palm Hills Group and Gold producer Centamin.
El-Fakharany was arrested in March 2013 during the tenure of Islamist president Mohamed Morsi on charges of inciting violence in the Delta city of Mahalla, but was later released.
